entities.name: gryffindor common room
entities.description: The Gryffindor common room is described as always very crowded these days. It is mentioned that from six o'clock onwards, the Gryffindors had nowhere else to go.

entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: The Gryffindors are mentioned as having plenty to talk about, resulting in the common room often not emptying until past midnight.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as going to get the Invisibility Cloak out of his trunk right after dinner and spending the evening sitting on it, waiting for the room to clear.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as being taken out by Harry from his trunk.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as challenging Harry and Ron to a few games of Exploding Snap.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as challenging Harry and Ron to a few games of Exploding Snap along with Fred.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being challenged by Fred and George to a few games of Exploding Snap.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as sitting watching them, very subdued in Hermione’s usual chair.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's usual chair is mentioned where Ginny sat watching the games.

relationships.description: Harry took out the Invisibility Cloak from his trunk.
Fred challenged Harry and Ron to a few games of Exploding Snap.
George challenged Harry and Ron to a few games of Exploding Snap along with Fred.
Ron was challenged by Fred and George to a few games of Exploding Snap.
Ginny sat watching them, very subdued in Hermione’s usual chair.
